contentrichtext.text: '''Mahir''' (also spelled '''Maher''', {{lang-ar|ماهر}}) is an Arabic and Turkish given name, it may refer to: ==Given name== *[[Mahershalalhashbaz Ali]], American actor *[[Maher Arar]], Canadian software engineer *[[Maher al-Assad]], brother of Syrian President Bashar al-Assad and head of the Presidential Guard *[[Maher-shalal-hash-baz]], son of Biblical prophet Isaiah *[[Maher Shalal Hash Baz]], artistic alter ego of Tori Kudo, a Japanese naivist composer and musician *[[Maher Charif]], Palestinian historian and lecturer at the Institut français du Proche-Orient in Syria * [[Mahir Çağrı]], Internet celebrity * [[Mahir Halili]], Albanian footballer * [[Mahir Jasem]], Emirati footballer * [[Ahmad Mahir Pasha]], Egyptian politician * [[Ali Mahir Pasha]], Egyptian politician *[[Maher Sabry]], Egyptian filmmaker, writer and gay rights activist * [[Mahir Sağlık]], Turkish footballer *[[Maher Al Sayed]], Syrian football player * [[Mahir Yağcılar]], Turkish Kosovar politician * [[Mahir al-Zubaydi]], al-Qaeda military commander {{given name}} ==Surname== *[[Ahmad Maher (disambiguation)|Ahmad Maher]], various people [[Category:Arabic masculine given names]] [[Category:Turkish masculine given names]]
